title: Russia plans to target dissidents in Ukraine to be killed or sent to camps, U.S. says
content:
1. Russia plans to target dissidents in Ukraine to be killed or sent to camps, U.S. says  NBC News
  2. U.S. intelligence says Russian commanders given orders to move forward with invasion of Ukraine  CBS New York
  3. U.S. warns that Moscow has compiled lists of Ukrainians to target after invasion  CNBC
  4. New intel adds to US fears that Russia is readying for military action  CNN
  5. The U.S. warns that Russia has a 'kill list' of Ukrainians to be detained or killed  NPR
contentSnippet:
Russia plans to target dissidents in Ukraine to be killed or sent to camps, U.S. says  NBC News
U.S. intelligence says Russian commanders given orders to move forward with invasion of Ukraine  CBS New York
U.S. warns that Moscow has compiled lists of Ukrainians to target after invasion  CNBC
New intel adds to US fears that Russia is readying for military action  CNN
The U.S. warns that Russia has a 'kill list' of Ukrainians to be detained or killed  NPR

localize.title: ロシアはウクライナの反体制派を殺害または収容所送りにする計画、米国が発表
美国称俄罗斯计划将乌克兰的持不同政见者作为杀害或送入集中营的目标
美國稱俄羅斯計劃將烏克蘭的持不同政見者作爲殺害或送入集中營的目標
